page.title: 12CLEETHORPES TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: Recently we carried out a traffic survey. We covered all the streets off St. Peter's Avenue except De Lacy Lane and Bowling Lane. We split up into groups,one for every street. We had half an hour to record the numbers of vehicles passing. Isaac's Hill was the busiest with{1510}vehicles per hour passing and Elm Road was the least busy with{ 52}vehicles passing. These are the totals in numerical order for the other streets: St.Peter's Avenue 564,St. Peter's Ave. (St.Andrew's Methodist Church) 546, Short Street 372,Cambridge Street 340, Mill Road 234, Bentley Street 210,and Albert Road 136. We included all kinds of transport from bicycles to buses. We thought that most of the traffic on Isaac's Hill would be coming from{Clee {Road}and{Grimsby Road.
